channel.title: CVE Feed for Spiffy Plugins -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Spiffy Plugins -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-30427|2024-03-29T13:22:55.633Z -- Spiffy Plugins -- Spiffy Calendar
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Spiffy Plugins Spiffy Calendar allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Spiffy Calendar: from n/a through 4.9.7.

item.title: CVE-2024-35651|2024-06-04T14:15:52.279Z -- Spiffy Plugins -- WP Flow Plus
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Spiffy Plugins WP Flow Plus allows Stored XSS.This issue affects WP Flow Plus: from n/a through 5.2.2.
